items.sentence: Tom promised he'd help us, but I don't believe him.
Tom started taking French lessons after he retired.
I don't know if there'll be someone waiting for me.
I now realize that I'd misunderstood what Tom said.
The ride with Tom was a terrible experience for me.
Tom has been seeing a counselor three times a week.
Tom said he knew something bad was going to happen.
Since it's raining, we can't paint the fence today.
Don't eat all the figs. Leave some for your sister.
Tom is standing on the table to change a lightbulb.
More people than expected showed up at the concert.
I wish someone would say something like that to me.
You smell like you haven't taken a bath in a month.
You should be able to walk again within a few days.
Even though Tom has a lot of money, he isn't happy.
Pretty soon, you'll realize that you need our help.
Mary and Alice were wearing the same color dresses.
I think that this is a step in the right direction.
Tom said that he didn't want to live anywhere else.
Keep the remote somewhere where Tom can't reach it.
